subtitle_text: You know, to pull off this irascible genius routine, one actually has to be a genius. I'm designing a machine that will allow us to break every message every day. Instantly.
trivia_question: What term describes a machine designed to break encrypted messages?
fun_fact: The Enigma Machine, used by Nazi Germany during WWII, was famously decrypted by Alan Turing and his team at Bletchley Park.
poll_question: Do you think the character's plan to break every message daily is feasible?
